data.name: GORGFX_ERR_CATASTROPHIC
data.value:
There was a catastrophic error in Gorgon.
Please report this error by pasting the details to the bug tracker in Gorgon's google code repository. If possible, please attach any log used by Gorgon to the bug report.

data.name: GORGFX_ERR_RENTED_TARGETS_IN_FLIGHT
data.value:
There are over 100 temporary render targets still in flight at the end of this frame.
This is most likely a memory leak. Please ensure that each rented temporary target is returned prior to the end of the frame.
This application will now exit.
